artist_name: Bryan Scary and the Shredding Tears
metrics_conclusion: Maria St Claire has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Maria St Claire has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Major,  and B Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
